Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Establishes a toll free hotline for complainants of workplace sexual harassment
Summary: Establishes a toll free hotline for complainants of workforce sexual harassment to be administered by the division of human rights; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing a toll free hotline for complainants of workplace sexual harassment
